The remington standard smarttype combines the elegance and reliability of a classic typewriter with a touch of retro digital humor ideal for typography enthusiasts collectors and creators seeking total concentration no notifications no pop ups just mechanical sound and paper

features

  • Zero latency mechanical typing immediate tactile feedback on every key
  • Instant printing each press marks the character on the paper
  • Robust and collectible design cast metal hand engraved keys
  • Modo no distracciones perfecto para enfocarse en el texto
  • Limited edition with numbered plaque
